meta.description: Optimize the production of toy trucks, planes, boats, and trains to maximize profit given resource constraints and logical conditions.

sets.name: TOYS
sets.description: Types of toys that can be manufactured

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling one unit of each toy

params.name: wood_required
params.description: Units of wood required to manufacture one unit of each toy

params.name: steel_required
params.description: Units of steel required to manufacture one unit of each toy

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of toy to manufacture

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a type of toy is manufactured

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling toys

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.description: Wood usage cannot exceed available wood

constraints.name: steel_constraint
constraints.description: Steel usage cannot exceed available steel

constraints.name: truck_train_exclusion
constraints.description: If trucks are manufactured, trains cannot be manufactured and vice versa

constraints.name: boat_plane_dependency
constraints.description: If boats are manufactured, planes must also be manufactured

constraints.name: boat_train_limit
constraints.description: Number of boats manufactured cannot exceed number of trains manufactured

constraints.name: truck_manufacture
constraints.description: Link binary decision to manufacture trucks with actual production

constraints.name: plane_manufacture
constraints.description: Link binary decision to manufacture planes with actual production

constraints.name: boat_manufacture
constraints.description: Link binary decision to manufacture boats with actual production

constraints.name: train_manufacture
constraints.description: Link binary decision to manufacture trains with actual production
